kit:data:bulk:upsert.description:
bulk upsert records from a CSV file
Upsert records using Bulk API and returns a job ID and a batch ID. Use these IDs to check job status with data:bulk:status.
For information about CSV file formats, see [Prepare CSV Files](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_asynch.meta/api_asynch/datafiles_csv_preparing.htm) in the Bulk API Developer Guide.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

externalid.name: externalid
externalid.description: the column name of the external ID

csvfile.name: csvfile
csvfile.description: the path of the CSV file that defines the records to upsert

mapping.name: mapping
mapping.description: the path of the JSON file that defines CSV column mappings

converter.name: converter
converter.description: the path of the script to convert CSV rows

setnull.name: setnull
setnull.description: set blank values as null values during upsert operations (default: empty field values are ignored)

saveonly.name: saveonly
saveonly.description: output converted.csv file and skip upsert for debugging

concurrencymode.name: concurrencymode
concurrencymode.description: the concurrency mode (Parallel or Serial) for the job

assignmentruleid.name: assignmentruleid
assignmentruleid.description: the ID of a specific assignment rule to run for a case or a lead.

batchsize.name: batchsize
batchsize.description: the batch size of the job

wait.name: wait
wait.description: the number of minutes to wait for the command to complete before displaying the results

kit:data:csv:convert.description: convert CSV data using column mapping file or Node.js script

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

inputfile.name: inputfile
inputfile.description: the path of the input CSV file (default: standard input)

outputfile.name: outputfile
outputfile.description: the path of the output CSV file (default: standard output)

mapping.name: mapping
mapping.description: the path of the JSON file that defines CSV column mappings

converter.name: converter
converter.description: the path of the script to convert CSV rows

kit:layout:assignments:deploy.description: deploy page layout assignments from JSON file

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

kit:layout:assignments:retrieve.description: retrieve page layout assignments and save to JSON file

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

profile.name: profile
profile.description: comma separated profile names to retrieve (default: all profiles)

object.name: object
object.description: comma separated object names to retrieve (default: objects which have multiple layouts)

merge.name: merge
merge.description: merge retrieved configurations with existing file
